author: National Bureau
text: The Congress on Tuesday approached President Pranab Mukherjee seeking his intervention into what it said was a “violation of the Constitution” by Arunachal Pradesh Governor J.P. Rajkhowa, who met rebel Congress leader Kalikho Pul who has staked claim to form the government in the State. The delegation was led by Leader of the Opposition in the Rajya Sabha Ghulam Nabi Azad and included former ministers Anand Sharma, Kapil Sibal and V. Narayanasamy.
title: President’s intervention sought
